mapper.sql: SELECT shi.id AS shi_id, shi.shipping_quantity AS shi_shipping_quantity, shi.created_at AS shi_created_at, ord.o_id AS ord_id, ord.o_order_number AS ord_order_number, ord.c_id AS cus_id, ord.c_customer_id AS cus_customer_id, ord.c_code AS cus_code, ord.c_name AS cus_name, ord.c_postal_code AS cus_postal_code, ord.c_first_address AS cus_first_address, ord.c_second_address AS cus_second_address, ord.c_third_address AS cus_third_address, ord.c_phone_number AS cus_phone_number, ordD.o_order_number AS ordD_order_number, ordD.o_detail_id AS ordD_detail_id, ordD.o_order_quantity AS ordD_order_quantity, ordD.o_completion_date AS ordD_completion_date, ordD.o_invalid AS ordD_invalid, ordD.i_id AS ite_id, ordD.i_item_id AS ite_item_id, ordD.i_code AS ite_code, ordD.i_name AS ite_name, ordD.i_unit_price AS ite_unit_price FROM shippings shi INNER JOIN ( SELECT o.id AS o_id, o.order_number AS o_order_number, c.id AS c_id, c.customer_id AS c_customer_id, c.code AS c_code, c.name AS c_name, c.postal_code AS c_postal_code, c.first_address AS c_first_address, c.second_address AS c_second_address, c.third_address AS c_third_address, c.phone_number AS c_phone_number FROM orders o INNER JOIN customers_history c ON o.customer_history_id = c.id ) ord ON shi.order_number = ord.o_order_number INNER JOIN ( SELECT o.order_number AS o_order_number, o.detail_id AS o_detail_id, o.order_quantity AS o_order_quantity, o.completion_date AS o_completion_date, o.invalid AS o_invalid, i.id AS i_id, i.item_id AS i_item_id, i.code AS i_code, i.name AS i_name, i.unit_price AS i_unit_price FROM orders_details o INNER JOIN items_history i ON o.item_history_id = i.id ) ordD ON shi.order_number = ordD.o_order_number AND shi.detail_id = ordD.o_detail_id

where.if: AND ( ord.c_first_address LIKE '%${address}%' OR ord.c_second_address LIKE '%${address}%' OR ord.c_third_address LIKE '%${address}%' )

mapper.select: SELECT SUM(shipping_quantity) FROM shippings WHERE order_number = #{orderNumber} AND detail_id = #{detailId} GROUP BY order_number, detail_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shippings ( order_number, detail_id, shipping_quantity ) VALUES ( #{orderDetail.orderNumber}, #{orderDetail.detailId}, #{shippingQuantity} )
